int.nextInt(): finds and returns the next int token from the user.

double.nextDouble(): finds and returns the next double token from the user.

String.next(): finds and returns the next complete token from the user.
String.nextLine(): returns the next line from the user.

boolean.hasNext(): true if there is a next token.
boolean.hasNextInt(): true if there is a next int token.
boolean.hasNextDouble(): true if there is a next double token.
boolean.hasNextLine(): true if the there is a next line to find.
